channel.title: Gauntlet Publishing Contacts & Info
channel.description:
You can follow Gauntlet Publishing on Twitter @gauntletpub
For questions about submissions and pitches for Codex, please join the Gauntlet Publishing Discord and inquire in the Codex Discussion channel, or DM us on Twitter @gauntletpub
You can join the Gauntlet Publishing Discord https://discord.gg/D8m2R3e7Ms You can join the Trophy Discord https://discord.gg/YARRMSDn6S
For the full index of Codex Issues see https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/codex-index.html
You’ll find pdf releases of Gauntlet publications on DTRPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/browse/pub/12676/The-Gauntlet You can find Gauntlet physical releases here: https://www.indiepressrevolution.com/xcart/The-Gauntlet/

item.title: Gauntlet Publishing Contacts & Info

item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

You can follow Gauntlet Publishing on Twitter @gauntletpub

For questions about submissions and pitches for Codex, please join the Gauntlet Publishing Discord and inquire in the Codex Discussion channel, or DM us on Twitter @gauntletpub
